name: ImportIssue
description:
Import an issue into the system.

This tool is used to import an issue into the Pylon system. Use it when you need to add new issues by importing them through a specified format or integration.

parameters.name: issue_import_request
parameters.description: A JSON object with details for the issue import, including account ID, assignee, attachments, created time, and more.

account_id.description: AccountID that the issue should belong to.

assignee_id.description: UserID that the issue should be assigned to.

attachment_urls.description: An array of attachment URLs to attach to this issue.

created_at.description: CreatedAt is the time the issue was created (RFC3339).

slug.description: The slug of the custom field.

value.description: The value of the custom field. Only to be used for single-valued custom fields. If unset, the custom field will be unset. If the custom field is a select field, the value must be the select option slug, which you can find from the GET /custom-fields endpoint.

values.description: The values of the custom field. Only to be used for multi-valued custom fields (ex. multiselect). If unset, the custom field will be unset. If the custom field is a multiselect field, the values must be the select option slugs which you can find from the GET /custom-fields endpoint.

custom_fields.description: An array of custom fields to be used on this issue.

external_issue_id.description: The ID of the external issue in the source system.

source.description: The source system of the external issue (e.g., "linear", "asana", "jira", "github").

external_issues.description: External issues to link to this issue.

intercom_conversation_id.description: The Intercom conversation ID associated with this issue, if any.

zendesk_ticket_id.description: The Zendesk ticket ID associated with this issue, if any.

first_response_time.description: FirstResponseTime is the time the issue was first responded to (RFC3339).

attachment_urls.description: An array of attachment URLs to attach to this message.

body_html.description: The HTML content of the message.

contact_id.description: The contact that sent the message. Only one of user_id or contact_id can be specified.

created_at.description: CreatedAt is the time the message was created (RFC3339).

user_id.description: The user that sent the message. Only one of user_id or contact_id can be specified.

messages.description: Messages to be imported for this issue. At least one message is required.

requester_id.description: ContactID that the issue should be on behalf of.

resolution_time.description: ResolutionTime is the time the issue was resolved (RFC3339).

state.description: The state of the issue. Can be one of new, waiting_on_you, waiting_on_customer, on_hold, closed, or a custom status.

tags.description: An array of strings to use as tags on this issue.

team_id.description: TeamID that the issue should be assigned to.

updated_at.description: UpdatedAt is the time the issue was last updated (RFC3339).
